item.description:
At the main US Post Office in Boston near South Station, 25 Dorchester Ave. Near Federal street. We will be there around 5pm until 12AM if we make it that long. If you do come please dress so we look like the regular Joe, so that they will take us seriously. Many of the tax movement people are starting to ban together, one day we will see this tax gone for good. I may be a little late but others will be there at 5pm


Contact:
Tom Curry
yardworksltd@comcast.net
item.name: Today! Income Tax Day Rally
